Name: Mark Felton
Job/Team Function: The Land Management Function provides the ownership, accountability and expertise within Natural England for the delivery of sustainable land management to achieve a healthy natural environment.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Jim Smyllie
Job/Team Function: Executive Director responsible for our Delivering with Communities Functions namely Access & Engagement, Land Management, Land Use and Landscape & Biodiversity and Marine.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Geoff Sansome
Job/Team Function: The Performance Function drives continuous improvement and change across the organisation. The functions core aim and purpose is to oversee the process by which Natural England develops its contract with government, delivers on its promises and evaluates and reports on its performance.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Ciaran Gannon
Job/Team Function: The Integration Function is responsible for ensuring local relationships, especially across our key customer groupings of Farmers, Local authorities and Developers, Mariners and the Access and Engagement community, receive a joined-up, coherent and integrated service.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: James Marsden
Job/Team Function: The Marine Function is responsible for delivering the whole of Natural England's core marine programme, focused on designation, monitoring and management of Marine Protected Areas (MPAs). It will also deliver our work on wider marine biodiversity.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Liz Newton
Job/Team Function: The Access and Engagement Function is responsible for providing advice on matters specified in Natural Englands general purpose which relate to: securing the provision and improvement of facilities for study, understanding and enjoyment of natural environment; and promoting access and encouraging open-air recreation.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Helen Phillips
Job/Team Function: Chief Executive and Accounting Officer for Natural England
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Guy Thompson
Job/Team Function: Executive Director responsible for our Customers Functions including External Affairs and Intregration.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Ken Roy
Job/Team Function: The Performance Function drives continuous improvement and change across the organisation. The functions core aim and purpose is to oversee the process by which Natural England develops its contract with government, delivers on its promises and evaluates and reports on its performance.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Andrew Wood
Job/Team Function: Executive Director responsible for our Science, Evidence base and Analysis Functions
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Paul Egginton
Job/Team Function: The Systems, Knowledge and Information (SKI) Team is an enabling Function to enable the business to do more, and do it better by driving business effectiveness and efficiency and maximising our contribution to the Strategic Direction.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Alan Law
Job/Team Function: The Land Use Function advise on the sustainable use of land and water to support communities and local government in their planning decisions to protect and enhance local environments. We also aim to secure new priority habitat and green infrastructure which deliver ecosystem services for both people and wildlife.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Tony Percival
Job/Team Function: The Estate and Facilities Function is responsible for Natural England's Estates and Facilities including the delivery of an Estates Rationalisation Programme called Working in Natural England (WINE) 2014.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Simon Sheppard
Job/Team Function: The Customer Services Function works to improve delivery and raise levels of customer satisfaction by introducing organisation-wide performance standards and applying principles of consistency and best practice. The Function also manages and processes the Agri-environment scheme administration and Statutory wildlife licensing work, relating specifically to species management and science and conservation licensing.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Paul Lambert
Job/Team Function: The Function is responsible for financial performance, Internal Audit and Sustainability
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Julian Woolford
Job/Team Function: The External Affairs Function works with colleagues across Natural England to get the right message to the right people at the right time, both externally and internally.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Maddy Jago
Job/Team Function: The Landscape and Biodiversity Function will help national and local partnerships to develop a shared purpose and set of integrated plans to deliver our statutory landscape and biodiversity outcomes
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Janette Ward
Job/Team Function: The Regulation Function is responsible for making full and proper use of statutory levers to ensure that Englands biodiversity is conserved, and ultimately enhanced, through these and the organisations wider work.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Ian Fugler
Job/Team Function: The Land Management Function provides the ownership, accountability and expertise within Natural England for the delivery of sustainable land management to achieve a healthy natural environment.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Peter Nottage
Job/Team Function: The OD Function is responsible for Natural England's Organisational Development, Human Resources and Health & Safety policy, practices and procedures.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Tim Hill
Job/Team Function: The Evidence & Analysis Function provides the core evidence and analysis that Natural England needs. It leads Natural England's Evidence Programme, provides monitoring and statutory reporting, intelligence gathering and geographical information services and supports the development of joined-up thinking across the organisation.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Dave Webster
Job/Team Function: Executive Director responsible for our Corporate Functions including Finance, Organisation Development (HR and H&S), Estates & Facilities, Internal Audit, IT, Legal Services and Procurement
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Rob Aubrook
Job/Team Function: The Standards Function is accountable for developing, maintaining and supporting the embedding and monitoring of Natural Englands unified set of standards, which provide a consistent framework for describing what we deliver and how we deliver it.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
